name: onnx
description: ONNX Runtime for AI model inference - CPU-based neural network inference

linux.note: Build from source or use distribution package
linux.command: sudo apt install libonnxruntime-dev || build from https://github.com/microsoft/onnxruntime

notes: Uses pkg-config if available, otherwise falls back to common library paths. ONNX Runtime pkg-config support varies by installation method.
